## NoMetadataSelectorComponent.metadataGatherer property

Instance of metadata gatherer, which is used for getting initial metadata

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get metadataGatherer(): MetadataGatherer<TMetadata>;

set metadataGatherer(gatherer: MetadataGatherer<TMetadata>);
```
